tool_description: A powerful WhatsApp Multi-Device Beta API that allows you to easily send unlimited WhatsApp messages in seconds.
name: Whatsly
title: Whatsly

api_list.name: Send Button Message
api_list.description: If your messages aren't sent check your instance status for connection/login problems. You can also check the endpoint or parameters to if you are using the wrong format you can find the error here.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsly.p.rapidapi.com/send-button"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsly.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get QR Code
api_list.description: Returns the **QR** code in the current session if there is one. We should be passing the **mobile number** as a parameter.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsly.p.rapidapi.com/generate-qr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsly.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
